successes.title: Mutant Chronicles Warzone Resurrection-28mm Miniatures Game
successes.description: Warzone Resurrection is a tabletop miniatures (28mm scale) skirmish game, set in the Mutant Chronicles dark SciFi Future.

Pledges.description: A big thankyou!  Official Basic Rules PDF (including proxy cards to cut out) .

Undead Legionnaire: 
PDF rules set and troop or monster box of your choice and limited edition 'Mutant Chronicles Warzone Resurrection' T-Shirt with brand new artwork. (~$29)
Chasseur: Special Edition Signed Rules and Background Book. (~$37)
Kickstarter Special: Starter box of your choice (RRP: £34.99). (choose from Cybertronic, Dark Legion, Brotherhood or Bauhaus). (~$46)
Necromutant: Starter box of your choice and Special Edition Signed Rules and Background Book. (~$86)
The Razide: 2 Starter boxes of your choice and Special Edition Signed Rules and Background Book. (~$130)
Dark Legion: 3 Starter boxes of your choice and Special Edition Signed Rules and Background Book. (~$170)
The Five: Each Starter and Kickstarter Special Edition Grand Strategy Cards Pack (30 cards), Limited Edition T-Shirt and Special Edition Signed Rules and Background Book.

The Five Heroes: Each Starter set and five heroes of your choice and Kickstarter Special Edition Grand Strategy Cards Pack (30 cards), Limited Edition T-Shirt and Special Edition Signed Rules and Background Book.

The Cartel: All 4 Starter sets plus 2 extra squads (monster or troop) for each. Kickstarter Special Edition Grand Strategy Cards Pack (30 cards), Limited Edition T-Shirt and Special Edition Signed Rules and Background Book. (~$385)

The Brotherhood: All 4 Starter sets plus 2 extra squads (monster or troop) for each. Kickstarter Special Edition Grand Strategy Cards Pack (30 cards), Limited Edition T-Shirt and Special Edition Signed Rules and Background Book. A Limited Edition Specially Designed Warzone Resurrection KR Multicase for each force. (~$515)

The Gaming Club: This is a special pledge level designed for big groups or clubs. (THE ITEMS IN THIS PLEDGE CAN NOT BE CHANGED FOR KICKSTARTER CREDITS-although you can add-on 'Add-ons'). You get 10 starter sets and 10 limited edition rule and background books. (~$675)

The Collector: One of everything unlocked or presented throughout the term of the KS, no more, no less. (THE ITEMS IN THIS PLEDGE CAN NOT BE CHANGED FOR KICKSTARTER CREDITS-although you can add-on 'Add-ons'). You still get £50 of extras, but all other freebies are included.

The Add-on Collector: One of every Add-on and the free KS cards unlocked or presented throughout the term of the KS, no more, no less. (THE ITEMS IN THIS PLEDGE CAN NOT BE CHANGED FOR KICKSTARTER CREDITS-although you can add-on more 'Add-ons'). You also get an additional 4 KR multicases to store you goodies. (this pledge level is exempt of all extras (they are included in the pledge)).

MegaCorporation: All 4 Starter sets plus 2 extra squads (monster or troop) for each. Kickstarter Special Edition Grand Strategy Cards Pack (30 cards), Limited Edition T-Shirt and Special Edition Signed Rules and Background Book. A Limited Edition Specially Designed Warzone Resurrection KR Multicase for each force plus your favourite faction painted by Worthy Painting. (~$1080)

The Painter Collector: 2 of everything unlocked or presented throughout the term of the KS, no more, no less. 1 to keep, 1 to paint (THE ITEMS IN THIS PLEDGE CAN NOT BE CHANGED FOR KICKSTARTER CREDITS-although you can add-on 'Add-ons'). You still get £99.50 of extras, but all other freebies are included.

Immortal: All 4 Starter sets plus 2 extra squads (monster or troop) for each. Kickstarter Special Edition Grand Strategy Cards Pack (30 cards), Limited Edition T-Shirt and Special Edition Signed Rules and Background Book. A Limited Edition Specially Designed Warzone Resurrection KR Multicase for each force plus all four factions painted by Worthy Painting. (~$2330)

Angelika Drachen: All 4 starter boxes plus  16 extra squads of your choice, Kickstarter Special Edition Grand Strategy Cards Pack (30 cards), Limited Edition T-Shirt and Special Edition Signed Rules and Background Book. Plus your head on the hero of the faction of your choice. We will work with you on this. (~$2715)

The Three Brothers: All 4 starter boxes plus  16 extra squads of your choice, Kickstarter Special Edition Grand Strategy Cards Pack (30 cards), Limited Edition T-Shirt and Special Edition Signed Rules and Background Book. Plus your head on a Lord  of the faction of your choice. We will work with you on the design and write special (but balanced) rules for your Lord character. (~$3100)

Dr. Diana: All 4 starter boxes plus  16 extra squads of your choice, Kickstarter Special Edition Grand Strategy Cards Pack (30 cards), Limited Edition T-Shirt and Special Edition Signed Rules and Background Book. Plus your head on a Lord of the faction of your choice. We will work with you on the design and write special (but balanced) rules for your Lord character. A 6" miniature of your choice pro painted by Worthy Painting. (~$4655)

The Cardinal: This is a special ONE! You get to choose one infantry unit type to get put into production, from any faction. We will then work with you to design them: from art, to concept, to 3D design, to final model. Your chosen squad will be lead by a leader with your face and s/he will feature in the Rule and Background book. You will then get 5 sets of this unit. As well as that, you will get all 4 starter boxes plus 8 extra squads of your choice, Kickstarter Special Edition Grand Strategy Cards Pack (30 cards), Limited Edition T-Shirt and Special Edition Signed Rules and Background Book. (PLEASE NOTE: a couple of units are not available for this offer. Please email us to confirm before you pledge) (~$6000)

The Dark Gods: All 4 starter boxes plus  16 extra squads of your choice, Kickstarter Special Edition Grand Strategy Cards Pack (30 cards), Limited Edition T-Shirt and Special Edition Signed Rules and Background Book. Plus your head and body on a Lord miniature of the faction of your choice. We will work with you on this. And a 6" version of your Lord miniature pro painted by Worthy Painting and 3D rendered computer art of him/her too! (~$7750)
